entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 9:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Drifting snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Drifting snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
